Autobahn|Android

Autobahn|Android is a subproject of Autobahn and provides open-source implementations of The WebSocket Protocol and the The Web Application Messaging Protocol (WAMP) in Java running on Android.

Useful Links

  • The Autobahn Project
  • Autobahn @ Google Groups
  • Autobahn @ GitHub
